articles.title: Chip wars with China risk 'enormous damage' to US tech, says Nvidia chief - Financial Times
articles.description: Jensen Huang tells lawmakers to be ‘thoughtful’ about imposing more export controls on Beijing
articles.content: The chief executive of Nvidia, the worlds most valuable semiconductor company, has warned that the US tech industry is at risk of enormous damage from the escalating battle over chips between Washing… [+4730 chars]

articles.title: Shell AGM: Climate activists storm shareholder meeting - BBC
articles.description: Protesters rush the stage at the oil giant's annual general meeting in London over climate plans.
articles.content:
Climate protesters stormed Shell's annual shareholder meeting in London, with security having to step in to protect board members.
Proceedings were delayed as the protesters, yelling "shut down Shel… [+2551 chars]
